original_text: Sarah was a woman like that. She obeyed her husband, Abraham. She called him, ‘My master’. So you wives also should do what is right. Do not let anything make you afraid. Then you will be like true daughters of Sarah.
korean_text: 사라가 아브라함을 주라 칭하여 순종한 것 같이 너희는 선을 행하고 아무 두려운 일에도 놀라지 아니하면 그의 딸이 된 것이니라

sentences.original_text: Sarah was a woman like that
So you wives also should do what is right
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 너희 아내들도 옳은 일을 해야 합니다

sentences.original_text: Do not let anything make you afraid
sentences.korean_translation: 아무것도 너희를 두렵게 하지 못하게 하십시오

sentences.original_text: Then you will be like true daughters of Sarah
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 너희는 사라의 참된 딸들이 될 것입니다
